---
title: Collection
---

Timestreams allow each point to contain a collection -- a `list` or `map` -- of elements.


| Method                                                     | Description                                                                |
|------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [Timestream.__getitem__](`kaskada.Timestream.__getitem__`) | Implement `self[key]` using `index`.                                       |
| [Timestream.flatten](`kaskada.Timestream.flatten`)         | Flatten a list of lists to a list of values.                               |
| [Timestream.index](`kaskada.Timestream.index`)             | Return a Timestream indexing into the elements of `self`.                  |
| [Timestream.length](`kaskada.Timestream.length`)           | Return a Timestream containing the length of `self`.                       |
| [Timestream.union](`kaskada.Timestream.union`)             | Union the lists in this timestream with the lists in the other Timestream. |
